START YOUR BUSINESS TODAY

Herbalife Nutrition products and business opportunities can support you to achieve nutritional and personal success. It operates in more than 90 countries around the world and commits to facilitate people achieve good nutrition and a healthy, active life directly supports the goals of our Independent Herbalife Nutrition Associates to grow their business.
World Class Company that Supports Your Business
World Transparent Distribution Model
World Competitive Compensation Plan
Training Program to Assist You Start and Grow Your Own Business
Products Based on Ingredient with Proven Nutrition Science
High-Profile Athletic Partnerships
Commitment to Social Responsibility

BE A PART OF THE CHANGE

The world is moving towards a more flexible environment. With Herbalife Nutrition, you can not only work leisurely at your own hours, but also from any place you want to. Grab the opportunity to strike that work-life balance by choosing your team and creating a work environment that suits your lifestyle

GOLD STANDARD GUARANTEE

We believe our science-based products are safe and efficacious and the Herbalife Nutrition business opportunity is unrivaled in the direct-selling industry. We are especially proud to offer what we believe to be the Gold Standard in consumer protection for all our Associates. Please take the time to review the Gold Standard Guarantees. They provide valuable information that will help ensure your Herbalife Nutrition Associateship experience is a positive one.
No Minimum purchases required or startup costs
100% refund guarantee on product
No Requirement to purchase any sales and business tools
Realistic expectations of the business opportunity, time and the effort required to success

30-DAY MONEY BACK

GUARANTEE

If for any reason, a retail customer is not completely satisfied with any Herbalife Nutrition product purchased from an Independent Herbalife Nutrition Associate, the customer may request a refund from the Associate within 30 days from the date the customer receives the product. The Associate must offer the customer a full credit toward the purchase of other Herbalife Nutrition products or a full refund of the purchase price.

BECOME AN INDEPENDENT HERBALIFE NUTRITION ASSOCIATE

When you are ready to become a part of Herbalife Nutrition India as a full-time or part-time Independent Herbalife Nutrition Associate, you will open gateways to earn what you're worth, help people live healthier, active lives, spend more time with family and friends and work from home, the beachâ€¦wherever!
